eye.name: eye
eye.transformationDescription:
By the time [npc.she] hesitantly [npc.verb(open)] them again, they've changed into lustrous dragonfly-like eyes, with the massive primary pair bulging out from the sides of [npc.her] face.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldDarkTeal(dragonfly-like eyes)] of a solid [npc.irisColour(true)] colour.
eye.bodyDescription: [npc.SheHasFull] [npc.eyePairs] dragonfly-like eyes. They are a reflective, solid [npc.irisColour(true)] colour, and bulge from the sides of [npc.her] face.
